channel.title: HI, im new and I need some help. =)
channel.description:
Hey everyone, Im new to moparscape and the whole private server thing. I think they are great! But I am new so i have a few questions. First off...Why for almost everyserver does it say it is down? Even though i downloaded hamatchi.
[glow=red,2,300]My second ? is can someone please tell me how I can make my own server? itd be really great because i have alot of ideas and stuff.[/glow]
If you do have an answer for either question you can post here or contact me on aim... my sn- D3ATH 2 LUK3
Tnx for your time :D

item.title: HI, im new and I need some help. =)
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyspike Mikeyspike
item.description:
@Mikeyspike wrote:

well they are down because the owner has not put the server up and for your second one there are some tuts on how to make thenm aroud help and development section

Read full topic
